# HCM202 Landing Page Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js landing page về Tư tưởng Hồ Chí Minh (HCM202) với timeline tương tác từ lịch sử đến tương lai.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Responsive design

## Project Structure
- `app/` - Next.js App Router pages
- `components/` - React components (Hero, Timeline, Quiz, Gallery)
- `public/` - Static assets (images, videos)
- `styles/` - Global styles

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow responsive design principles
- Implement smooth scroll animations
- Support dark/light mode
- Keep components modular and reusable

## Setup Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Get project setup info
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project
- [ ] Customize structure
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Run dev server
